attributes.action: No More Taxes, Let the UK Government work on Grants from its National Bank
attributes.additional_details:
Blog 
Https://helptheworld.live

YouTube 
Helptheworld.live https://youtu.be/seOLI47b7oM https://youtu.be/SKfsRIv_tUY

Solutions to Problems

Profit Margin Caps (e.g. price can’t be higher then 80% of total costs) can keep prices down & stop inflation

Lack of food & over population can be overcome easily with proper plans where there is no money restrictions. One solution is to develop upwards

Working can be made compolsary for younger generations up to 50 or 55 years old so sociaties function
attributes.background: Free public services and good causes, we should not be paying for public services. The Bank of England should be able to supply the government with as much funds as it wants to give us free public services but no expenditure on harmful stuff like bombs, guns and environmentally damaging investments.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
